Description: Moulded pottery shabti of Tjanefer with painted detail: a black lappet-wig, a yellow face, a white body and crossed yellow hands; the front of the leg section is inscribed with a column of black painted hieroglyphs(worn) on a yellow ground within a black border; the back is unshaped.
Curator's comments: In set with .9484 In set with .9485 In set with .9486
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Somerset Lowry-Corry, 2nd Earl of Belmore
